system.availability: Wearer must have Psyker Trait. Can target individual within line of Sight as Full Action with Ranged and Concentration subtypes, making -20 Willpower Test (or -30 if character not dedicated to Tzeentch). For each Degree of Success, target loses the ability to use one Psychic Power for the remainder of the encounter, chosen randomly.
system.cost: Strange ever shifting pendants, worn as necklaces, wristbands, etc.
